alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:29PM EDT until July 09 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 327 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Churchtown, moving north at 20 mph. This storm has reformed several times since 3 PM. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Holland, Adamstown, Terre Hill, Churchtown, Bowmansville, Fivepointville, Blue Ball and Goodville. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 287 to 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
